basic.description: Methods and theory for ordinary and partial differential equations; separation of variables in rectangular and cylindrical coordinate systems; sinusoidal and Bessel orthogonal functions; the wave, diffusion, and Laplace's equation; Sturm-Liouville theory; Fourier transform and Laplace transform techniques.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Fourier Methods for Boundary Value Problems

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 227 or MATH 227 or MTHE 280 or MATH 280 and MATH 226 or MTHE 237 or MATH 237 or MTHE 232 or MATH 232 or permission of the department. Must also be registered in BSCE
